attributes.action: PUT A STOP TO  MOD CIVIL SERVENTS GETTING LARGE BONUSES GIVE IT TO BRITISH SOLDIERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
put the money into the right place like giving the british army the right equipment to they have got a chance. 
these por soldiers are risking there lives for our country and loads are not coming home alive to there family because they do not have the right equipment.
its a disgrace something needs to be done

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
